name: TONICO POCKET
description:
TONICO POCKET

PT-BR

Tonico recebe ajuda de Pompom para encontrar as araras que fugiram.
Setas do teclado controlam Pompom para direita e esquerda.
Botão 'Z' - Início/Reinício.
Botão 'X' - música liga/desliga.

JOGOS RELACIONADOS

POMPOM https://plusup.itch.io/pompom
POMPOM CARDS https://plusup.itch.io/pompom-cards
TONICO https://plusup.itch.io/tonico
TONICO CARDS https://plusup.itch.io/tonico-cards

EN

Tonico gets help from Pompom to find the escaped macaws.
Keyboard arrows control Pompom left and right.
'Z' button - Start/Restart.
'X' button - music on/off.

RELATED GAMES

POMPOM https://plusup.itch.io/pompom
POMPOM CARDS https://plusup.itch.io/pompom-cards
TONICO https://plusup.itch.io/tonico
TONICO CARDS https://plusup.itch.io/tonico-cards

TONICO POCKET

Code, design, tests, characters, music and sound effects by Murilo Soares.
